title: Note 3

title: Red Fish
text: Some fish does sound good at the moment.

title: Blue Fish
text: Maybe breaded, maybe grilled. Preferably salmon or trout, but some snapper or walleye doesn't sound so bad.

title: A Møøse once bit my sister
